metadata.title: CVE-2012-4569 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description:
Multiple cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerabilities in out/out.UsrMgr.phpin LetoDMS (formerly MyDMS) before 3.3.9 allow remote attackers to injectarbitrary web script or HTML via unspecified vectors.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2012-4569` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

letodms - 3.3.9+dfsg-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: letodms package in trusty, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.3.9+dfsg-1').
